lessons.japanese: ラッシュアワー時にはもっとバスが出るべきだ。
lessons.english: There ought to be more buses during the rush hours.

lessons.japanese: ラッシュアワーの電車で行くよりむしろ早く出かけるほうがいい。
lessons.english: I would rather leave early than travel on rush-hour trains.

lessons.japanese: ラッシュアワーにでくわすのは最低だ。
lessons.english: It's horrible to get caught in rush hour traffic.

lessons.japanese: もうすぐラッシュアワーの時間帯に入る。
ラッシュアワー時にはもっとバスが出るべきだ。
lessons.english: There ought to be more buses during the rush hours.

lessons.japanese: ラッシュアワーの電車で行くよりむしろ早く出かけるほうがいい。
lessons.english: I would rather leave early than travel on rush-hour trains.
